texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 6.1.6 A new clause: "there is a Change in Control of the Owner. For the purposes of this clause, a person shall have "Control" of a company if he holds, directly or indirectly, shares which together with shares held by any persons acting in concert with him carry 50% or more of the voting rights of that company, and "Change in Control" shall be interpreted accordingly. Words and phrases in the City Code on Take-overs and Mergers shall have the same meaning here."
texts.text: 6.1.6 A new clause: "there is a Change in Control of the Owner. Words and phrases in the City Code on Take-overs and Mergers shall have the same meaning here."

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: It is agreed that:
texts.text: It is agreed that:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 1 Definitions
texts.text: 1 Definitions

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: In this Agreement the following terms shall have the following meanings:
texts.text: In this Agreement the following terms shall have the following meanings:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: "Full Verification Service" means those bespoke tests agreed between the Licensee and NCC for the verification of the Material;
texts.text: "Full Verification Service" means those bespoke tests agreed between the Licensee and NCC for the verification of the Material;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: "Intellectual Property Rights" means copyright, trade secret, patent, and all other rights of a similar nature;
texts.text: "Intellectual Property Rights" means copyright, trade secret, patent, and all other rights of a similar nature;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: "Licence Agreement" means the licence granted to the Licensee for the Package;
texts.text: "Licence Agreement" means the licence granted to the Licensee for the Package;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: "Material" means the source code of the Package comprising the latest technical information and documentation described in Schedules 1 and 2;
texts.text: "Material" means the source code of the Package comprising the latest technical information and documentation described in Schedules 1 and 2;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: "Package" means the software package licensed to the Licensee under the Licence Agreement; and
texts.text: "Package" means the software package licensed to the Licensee under the Licence Agreement; and

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: "Standard Verification Service" means those tests detailed in the Standard Verification Service published by NCC from time to time.
texts.text: "Standard Verification Service" means those tests detailed in the Standard Verification Service published by NCC from time to time.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 2 Owner's Duties and Warranties
texts.text: 2 Owner's Duties and Warranties

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: The Owner shall:
texts.text: The Owner shall:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: deliver a copy of the Material to NCC within 30 days of the date of this Agreement;
texts.text: deliver a copy of the Material to NCC within 30 days of the date of this Agreement;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: at all times ensure that the Material as delivered to NCC is capable of being used to generate the latest version of the Package issued to the Licensee and shall deliver further copies of the Material as and when necessary;
texts.text: at all times ensure that the Material as delivered to NCC is capable of being used to generate the latest version of the Package issued to the Licensee and shall deliver further copies of the Material as and when necessary;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: deliver to NCC a replacement copy of the Material within 12 months of the last delivery;
texts.text: deliver to NCC a replacement copy of the Material within 12 months of the last delivery;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: deliver a replacement copy of the Material within 14 days of receipt of a notice served upon it by NCC under the provisions of Clause 4.1.5; and
texts.text: deliver a replacement copy of the Material within 14 days of receipt of a notice served upon it by NCC under the provisions of Clause 4.1.5; and

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: deliver with each deposit of the Material the information detailed in Schedule 2.
texts.text: deliver with each deposit of the Material the information detailed in Schedule 2.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: The Owner warrants that:
texts.text: The Owner warrants that:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: it owns the Intellectual Property Rights in the Material and has authority to enter into this Agreement; and
texts.text: it owns the Intellectual Property Rights in the Material and has authority to enter into this Agreement; and

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: the Material lodged under Clause 2.1 shall contain all information in human-readable form and on suitable media to enable a reasonably skilled programmer or analyst to understand, maintain and correct the Package without the assistance of any other person.
texts.text: the Material lodged under Clause 2.1 shall contain all information in human-readable form and on suitable media to enable a reasonably skilled programmer or analyst to understand, maintain and correct the Package without the assistance of any other person.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 3 Licensee's Responsibilities
texts.text: 3 Licensee's Responsibilities

texts.label: text
texts.orig: It shall be the responsibility of the Licensee to notify NCC of any change to the Package that necessitates a replacement deposit of the Material.
texts.text: It shall be the responsibility of the Licensee to notify NCC of any change to the Package that necessitates a replacement deposit of the Material.

texts.orig: Version 1: August 1997 1 of 6
texts.text: Version 1: August 1997 1 of 6

texts.text: 4 NCC's Duties

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: NCC shall:
texts.text: NCC shall:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: hold the Material in a safe and secure environment;
texts.text: hold the Material in a safe and secure environment;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: inform the Owner and the Licensee of the receipt of any copy of the Material;
texts.text: inform the Owner and the Licensee of the receipt of any copy of the Material;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: in accordance with the terms of Clause 9 perform those tests that form part of its Standard Verification Service from time to time;
texts.text: in accordance with the terms of Clause 9 perform those tests that form part of its Standard Verification Service from time to time;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: at all times retain a copy of the latest verified deposit of the Material; and
texts.text: at all times retain a copy of the latest verified deposit of the Material; and

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: notify the Owner if it becomes aware at any time during the term of this Agreement that the copy of the Material held by it has been lost, damaged or destroyed.
texts.text: notify the Owner if it becomes aware at any time during the term of this Agreement that the copy of the Material held by it has been lost, damaged or destroyed.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: NCC shall not be responsible for procuring the delivery of the Material in the event of failure by the Owner to do so.
texts.text: NCC shall not be responsible for procuring the delivery of the Material in the event of failure by the Owner to do so.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 5 Payment
texts.text: 5 Payment

texts.label: text
texts.orig: NCC's fees are payable in accordance with Schedule 4.
texts.text: NCC's fees are payable in accordance with Schedule 4.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 6 Release Events
texts.text: 6 Release Events

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Subject to the provisions of Clauses 6.2 and 6.3, NCC shall release the Material to a duly authorised officer of the Licensee if at any time or times any of the following events or circumstances occur, arise or become apparent:
texts.text: Subject to the provisions of Clauses 6.2 and 6.3, NCC shall release the Material to a duly authorised officer of the Licensee if at any time or times any of the following events or circumstances occur, arise or become apparent:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: the Owner enters into any composition or arrangement with its creditors or (being a company) enters into liquidation whether compulsory or voluntary (other than for the purposes of solvent reconstruction or amalgamation) or has a receiver or administrative receiver appointed over all or any part of its assets or undertaking or a petition is presented for an Administration Order or (being an individual or partnership) becomes bankrupt, or an event occurs within the jurisdiction of the country in which the Owner is situated which has a similar effect to any of the above events in the United Kingdom; or
texts.text: the Owner enters into any composition or arrangement with its creditors or (being a company) enters into liquidation whether compulsory or voluntary (other than for the purposes of solvent reconstruction or amalgamation) or has a receiver or administrative receiver appointed over all or any part of its assets or undertaking or a petition is presented for an Administration Order or (being an individual or partnership) becomes bankrupt, or an event occurs within the jurisdiction of the country in which the Owner is situated which has a similar effect to any of the above events in the United Kingdom; or

texts.label: text
texts.orig: the Owner ceases to trade; or
texts.text: the Owner ceases to trade; or

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: the Owner assigns copyright in the Material and the assignee fails within 60 days of such assignment to offer the Licensee substantially similar protection to that provided by this Agreement without significantly increasing the cost to the Licensee; or
texts.text: the Owner assigns copyright in the Material and the assignee fails within 60 days of such assignment to offer the Licensee substantially similar protection to that provided by this Agreement without significantly increasing the cost to the Licensee; or

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: the Owner without legal justification, has defaulted to a material degree in any obligation to provide maintenance or modification of the Package under the Licence Agreement or any maintenance agreement entered into in connection with the Package and has failed to remedy such default notified by the Licensee to the Owner; or
texts.text: the Owner without legal justification, has defaulted to a material degree in any obligation to provide maintenance or modification of the Package under the Licence Agreement or any maintenance agreement entered into in connection with the Package and has failed to remedy such default notified by the Licensee to the Owner; or

texts.label: list_item

texts.orig: Where there is any dispute as to the occurrence of any of the events or circumstances set out in Clause 6.1.1 to 6.1.4, 6.2 or 6.3 or the fulfilment of any obligations detailed therein, such dispute will be referred at the request of either the Owner or the Licensee to the Managing Director for the time being of NCC for the appointment of an expert who shall give a decision on the matter within 14 days of the date of referral or as soon as practicable thereafter. The expert's decision shall be final and binding as between the Owner and the Licensee except in the case of manifest error.
texts.text: Where there is any dispute as to the occurrence of any of the events or circumstances set out in Clause 6.1.1 to 6.1.4, 6.2 or 6.3 or the fulfilment of any obligations detailed therein, such dispute will be referred at the request of either the Owner or the Licensee to the Managing Director for the time being of NCC for the appointment of an expert who shall give a decision on the matter within 14 days of the date of referral or as soon as practicable thereafter. The expert's decision shall be final and binding as between the Owner and the Licensee except in the case of manifest error.

texts.label: list_item

texts.text: Where there is any dispute as to the occurrence of any of the events or circumstances set out in Clause 6.1.5 or the fulfillment of any obligations referred to therein, such dispute will be referred to arbitration in accordance with Clause 12.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 7 Confidentiality
texts.text: 7 Confidentiality

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: The Material shall remain the confidential property of the Owner and in the event that NCC provides a copy of the Material to the Licensee, the Licensee shall be permitted to use the Material only in accordance with a confidentiality undertaking in the form contained in Schedule 3.
texts.text: The Material shall remain the confidential property of the Owner and in the event that NCC provides a copy of the Material to the Licensee, the Licensee shall be permitted to use the Material only in accordance with a confidentiality undertaking in the form contained in Schedule 3.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: NCC agrees to maintain all information and/or documentation coming into its possession or to its knowledge under this Agreement in strictest confidence and secrecy. NCC further agrees not to make use of such information and/or documentation other than for the purposes of this Agreement and will not disclose or release it other than in accordance with the terms of this Agreement.
texts.text: NCC agrees to maintain all information and/or documentation coming into its possession or to its knowledge under this Agreement in strictest confidence and secrecy. NCC further agrees not to make use of such information and/or documentation other than for the purposes of this Agreement and will not disclose or release it other than in accordance with the terms of this Agreement.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Termination of this Agreement will not relieve NCC or its employees, or the Licensee or its employees, from the obligations of confidentiality contained in this Clause 7.
texts.text: Termination of this Agreement will not relieve NCC or its employees, or the Licensee or its employees, from the obligations of confidentiality contained in this Clause 7.

texts.text: 8 Intellectual Property Rights

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 9 Verification
texts.text: 9 Verification

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Subject to the provisions of Clauses 9.2 and 9.3, NCC shall bear no obligation or responsibility to any person, firm, company or entity whatsoever to determine the existence, relevance, completeness, accuracy, effectiveness or any other aspect of the Material.
texts.text: Subject to the provisions of Clauses 9.2 and 9.3, NCC shall bear no obligation or responsibility to any person, firm, company or entity whatsoever to determine the existence, relevance, completeness, accuracy, effectiveness or any other aspect of the Material.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Upon the Material being lodged with NCC, NCC shall perform those tests in accordance with its Standard Verification Service and shall provide a copy of the test report to the parties to this Agreement.
texts.text: Upon the Material being lodged with NCC, NCC shall perform those tests in accordance with its Standard Verification Service and shall provide a copy of the test report to the parties to this Agreement.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: The Licensee shall be entitled to require that NCC carries out a Full Verification. Any reasonable charges and expenses incurred by NCC in carrying out a Full Verification will be paid by the Licensee save that if in the opinion of the expert appointed by the Managing Director of NCC the Material is substantially defective in content any such reasonable charges and expenses will be paid by the Owner.
texts.text: The Licensee shall be entitled to require that NCC carries out a Full Verification. Any reasonable charges and expenses incurred by NCC in carrying out a Full Verification will be paid by the Licensee save that if in the opinion of the expert appointed by the Managing Director of NCC the Material is substantially defective in content any such reasonable charges and expenses will be paid by the Owner.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 10 NCC's Liability
texts.text: 10 NCC's Liability

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: NCC shall not be liable for any loss caused to the Owner or the Licensee either jointly or severally except for loss of or damage to the Material to the extent that such loss or damage is caused by the negligent acts or omissions of NCC, its employees, agents or sub-contractors and in such event NCC's total liability in respect of all claims arising under or by virtue of this Agreement shall not (except in the case of claims for personal injury or death) exceed the sum of (pounds)500,000.
texts.text: NCC shall not be liable for any loss caused to the Owner or the Licensee either jointly or severally except for loss of or damage to the Material to the extent that such loss or damage is caused by the negligent acts or omissions of NCC, its employees, agents or sub-contractors and in such event NCC's total liability in respect of all claims arising under or by virtue of this Agreement shall not (except in the case of claims for personal injury or death) exceed the sum of (pounds)500,000.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: NCC shall in no circumstances be liable to the Owner or the Licensee for indirect or consequential loss of any nature whatsoever whether for loss of profit, loss of business or otherwise.
texts.text: NCC shall in no circumstances be liable to the Owner or the Licensee for indirect or consequential loss of any nature whatsoever whether for loss of profit, loss of business or otherwise.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: NCC shall be protected in acting upon any written request, waiver, consent, receipt or other document furnished to it pursuant to this Agreement, not only in assuming its due execution and the validity and effectiveness of its provisions but also as to the truth and acceptability of any information contained in it, which NCC in good faith believes to be genuine and what it purports to be.
texts.text: NCC shall be protected in acting upon any written request, waiver, consent, receipt or other document furnished to it pursuant to this Agreement, not only in assuming its due execution and the validity and effectiveness of its provisions but also as to the truth and acceptability of any information contained in it, which NCC in good faith believes to be genuine and what it purports to be.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 11 Termination
texts.text: 11 Termination

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: NCC may terminate this Agreement after failure by the Owner or the Licensee to comply with a 30 day written notice from NCC to pay any outstanding fee. If the failure to pay is on the part of the Owner the Licensee shall be given the option of paying such fee itself. Such amount will be recoverable by the Licensee direct from the Owner.
texts.text: NCC may terminate this Agreement after failure by the Owner or the Licensee to comply with a 30 day written notice from NCC to pay any outstanding fee. If the failure to pay is on the part of the Owner the Licensee shall be given the option of paying such fee itself. Such amount will be recoverable by the Licensee direct from the Owner.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: NCC may terminate this Agreement by giving 60 days written notice to the Owner and the Licensee. In that event the Owner and the Licensee shall appoint a mutually acceptable new custodian on terms similar to those contained in this Agreement.
texts.text: NCC may terminate this Agreement by giving 60 days written notice to the Owner and the Licensee. In that event the Owner and the Licensee shall appoint a mutually acceptable new custodian on terms similar to those contained in this Agreement.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: If a new custodian is not appointed within 30 days of delivery of any notice issued by NCC in accordance with the provisions of Clause 11.2, the Owner or the Licensee shall be entitled to request the President for the time being of the British Computer Society to appoint a suitable new custodian upon such terms and conditions as he shall require. Such appointment shall be final and binding on all parties.
texts.text: If a new custodian is not appointed within 30 days of delivery of any notice issued by NCC in accordance with the provisions of Clause 11.2, the Owner or the Licensee shall be entitled to request the President for the time being of the British Computer Society to appoint a suitable new custodian upon such terms and conditions as he shall require. Such appointment shall be final and binding on all parties.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: If the Licence Agreement has expired or has been lawfully terminated this Agreement will automatically terminate on the same date.
texts.text: If the Licence Agreement has expired or has been lawfully terminated this Agreement will automatically terminate on the same date.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: The Licensee may terminate this Agreement at any time by giving written notice to the Owner and NCC.
texts.text: The Licensee may terminate this Agreement at any time by giving written notice to the Owner and NCC.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: The Owner may only terminate this Agreement with the written consent of the Licensee.
texts.text: The Owner may only terminate this Agreement with the written consent of the Licensee.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 12 Arbitration
texts.text: 12 Arbitration

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Any dispute arising under Clause 5.1.5 shall be referred to a panel of arbitrators ("the Panel") constituted as follows:
texts.text: Any dispute arising under Clause 5.1.5 shall be referred to a panel of arbitrators ("the Panel") constituted as follows:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: the Owner and the Licensee shall each appoint one member; and
texts.text: the Owner and the Licensee shall each appoint one member; and

texts.label: text
texts.orig: the third member who shall act as chairman of the Panel shall be appointed by the President for the time being of the International Chamber of Commerce.
texts.text: the third member who shall act as chairman of the Panel shall be appointed by the President for the time being of the International Chamber of Commerce.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: The Owner and the Licensee shall pay the fees and disbursements of its own member and half the fees and disbursements of the chairman of the Panel.
texts.text: The Owner and the Licensee shall pay the fees and disbursements of its own member and half the fees and disbursements of the chairman of the Panel.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Should any member of the Panel die, become ill or incapacitated, resign or retire from his appointment, become disqualified from acting or otherwise cease to act as arbitrator before the dispute is resolved, he shall be replaced by a new member appointed by the party who appointed his predecessor.
texts.text: Should any member of the Panel die, become ill or incapacitated, resign or retire from his appointment, become disqualified from acting or otherwise cease to act as arbitrator before the dispute is resolved, he shall be replaced by a new member appointed by the party who appointed his predecessor.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Upon the appointment of such new member, the proceedings shall not be held de nova but shall continue from the stage at which the previous member ceased to act.
texts.text: Upon the appointment of such new member, the proceedings shall not be held de nova but shall continue from the stage at which the previous member ceased to act.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Proceedings under Clause 12 may be commenced by any party to a dispute by:
texts.text: Proceedings under Clause 12 may be commenced by any party to a dispute by:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: serving upon the other or others notice of its intention to refer such dispute to arbitration and nominating a member of the Panel; and
texts.text: serving upon the other or others notice of its intention to refer such dispute to arbitration and nominating a member of the Panel; and

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: requesting the President of the International Chamber of Commerce for the time being to appoint a chairman of the Panel.
texts.text: requesting the President of the International Chamber of Commerce for the time being to appoint a chairman of the Panel.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: The Panel shall determine its own rules of procedure.
texts.text: The Panel shall determine its own rules of procedure.

texts.orig: This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of England and Wales.
texts.text: This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of England and Wales.

texts.orig: This Agreement represents the whole agreement relating to the escrow arrangements between the parties for the Package and supersedes all prior arrangements, negotiations and undertakings.
texts.text: This Agreement represents the whole agreement relating to the escrow arrangements between the parties for the Package and supersedes all prior arrangements, negotiations and undertakings.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: All notices to be given to the parties under this Agreement shall be deemed to have been duly given or made when delivered personally or days after posting of it sent by facsimile, 12 hours after despatch to the party to which such notice is required to be given or made under this Agreement addressed to the principal place of business, or for companies based in the UK, the registered office.
texts.text: All notices to be given to the parties under this Agreement shall be deemed to have been duly given or made when delivered personally or days after posting of it sent by facsimile, 12 hours after despatch to the party to which such notice is required to be given or made under this Agreement addressed to the principal place of business, or for companies based in the UK, the registered office.
